name: SquareLike
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Dodge

E - Interact

Tab - To inspect your stats

Esc - pause ( though there is no feedback lol)

  • A game made for Secret Santa Jam 2020.  My original giftee said they liked Enter the Gungeon and card games so I tried to incorporate both of those things into a game.  This is what I ended up with. 

    Note that some of the "bullets" are actually presents because initially I was going for a sort of Christmas theme but never got around to fleshing it out.


    Packages:
  • DOTween
  • ScriptableObjectArchitecture
  • Cinemachine
  • AstarProject
  • Various Free SFX packages via the Unity Store
  • Music made in Garageband
  • Tile assets from Kenney Assets
